titleStmt.title: A discourse of divine providence, made before an honourable auditory by Samuel Herne ...
titleStmt.author: Herne, Samuel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Newcomb for G. Kunholt, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: A sermon on the Popish Plot.
